description: This PHP source file manages Add/Edit operations for 1-1 NAT configurations in a network device's web interface, including form handling, data fetching, and JavaScript for form validation and interactions.

methods.name: initNatFields
methods.description: Initializes the NAT form fields with existing NAT configuration data.

methods.name: initValidation
methods.description: Sets up validation rules for the NAT form fields using jQuery Validate.

methods.name: validateIpRange
methods.description: Validates that the public and private IP addresses are within correct subnets and do not conflict with static IPs.

methods.name: onsave
methods.description: Collects form data, validates IP ranges, and submits the form via AJAX for adding or editing NAT rules.
